work_description: Check out some of my work
about_description: I'm Abdulrahman, a front-end developer specializing in designing and developing websites and e-commerce stores such as Shopify, Wix, Zid, and NicePage. I have experience designing landing pages, landing pages, and large-scale projects, with a focus on improving performance and user experience. I have strong front-end development skills using React.js and Next.js, with proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks like Bootstrap and Tailwind CSS. I also have experience working with Node.js and Strapi to create dynamic and scalable websites. I always strive to deliver clean and organized code, paying attention to the smallest details to ensure a smooth user experience and high performance. I have experience in search engine optimization (SEO) and e-commerce optimization in terms of speed, design, and integration with various tools. I strive to provide professional solutions tailored to clients' needs, whether in designing and customizing templates and themes or building distinct, responsive websites that work efficiently across all devices.
aboutTextCV: Frontend developer with strong skills in building responsive web interfaces using React, Tailwind, and JavaScript. Passionate about UI/UX and clean design.
edu1: Delta Higher Institute for Computers and Information ‚Äì Mansoura
freelance1: Developed landing pages and custom sections for Shopify stores.
freelance2: Built multi-language websites using React and i18next.
freelance3: Customized Wix, Shopify, and Nicepage stores based on client needs.
freelance4: Implemented sliders, forms, and interactive sections using pure CSS and Liquid.
